EmailTemplate.name: Birm AM holding email 16
EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor Opportunity...coming soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
You may have been expecting an email inviting you apply to be an Associate Mentor with NCS this summer by now.
DON'T WORRY! We haven't forgotten you, a slight technical problem means that you will get your invitation email next week. It will contain more info about being an Associate Mentor and how to sign up.
Stay excited,
Liam
